DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety and patient acceptability of Somatuline Autogel in patients with acromegaly previously treated with octreotide LAR.
DOC.brief_title: Lanreotide Autogel in Patients With Acromegaly Previously Treated With Octreotide LAR
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of acromegaly The patient must have been tested at Week 4 (4 weeks prior to the Baseline visit) and shown to have a GH level <10 mU/L. The patient must have been treated with a stable dose of octreotide LAR for at least four months prior to study entry Life expectancy of at least 2 years Adenectomy within past 6 months, or likely during study period Radiotherapy for acromegalic disease within 1 year, or likely during study period Unstable concomitant dopamine agonist therapy
